subject: Volleyball
Travel and Vacations
lead_paragraph: Ray D’Errico, an account executive for a retail brokerage in Upper Saddle River, N.J., spends most of his summer vacations at beach volleyball stops around the country.
snippet: Ray D’Errico, an account executive for a retail brokerage in Upper Saddle River, N.J., spends most of his summer vacations at beach volleyball stops around the country.
